concept_hook: Rio's samba seductress provokes foes into reckless attacks with teasing dances and whispers, then counters with joint-shattering precision, thrilled by their humiliated fury.
body_type: curvaceous flexible latina with sun-kissed skin and hypnotic hips
narrative_role: Crowd-hypnotizing performer who turns fights into erotic spectacles
media_archetype_inspiration: Mileena's seductive dancer assassin from Mortal Kombat

concept_hook: Seoul's taekwondo prodigy anticipates every move with genius-level foresight, dismantling foes clinically but shattering inwardly when seduced or mind-gamed.
body_type: petite wiry toned with sharp asian features and endless agility
narrative_role: Rising wunderkind prodigy defying veterans with pure skill
media_archetype_inspiration: Yoruichi Shihouin speed prodigy from Bleach

concept_hook: Moscow's ballerina contortionist snaps bones like twigs in graceful spins, her doll-like poise cracking only when cornered and overwhelmed.
body_type: slender porcelain-fragile with icy blonde hair and deceptive flexibility
narrative_role: Deceptively fragile underdog hiding lethal acrobatics
media_archetype_inspiration: Suigintou killer doll from Rozen Maiden

concept_hook: Rome's gladiatorial queen crushes ribs with regal stomps and whips, her composure fracturing into vengeful rage when outmaneuvered by inferiors.
body_type: statuesque commanding curves with olive skin and fiery red hair
narrative_role: Dominant ruler enforcing hierarchy through brutal spectacle
media_archetype_inspiration: Red Sonja warrior empress from Conan comics

concept_hook: Manchester's stealth tracker ambushes with clawing takedowns from shadows, her predatory calm turning to feral snarls when prey slips her grasp.
body_type: lean athletic predator with pale skin and piercing green eyes

concept_hook: Mexico City's chemist injects paralytics mid-grapple before throttling victims slowly, her sadistic glee fading to paranoia under sustained assault.
body_type: sinuous curvaceous with bronzed latina skin and hypnotic gaze
narrative_role: Treacherous opportunist sowing distrust in the roster
media_archetype_inspiration: Taskmaster's poison femme fatale from G.I. Joe

concept_hook: Bangkok's curse chanter hexes limbs to seize up before shredding with spectral claws, her mystical detachment giving way to desperate chants when grounded.
body_type: ethereal graceful with exotic thai features and flowing dark hair
narrative_role: Mysterious harbinger weaving rivalries into curses
media_archetype_inspiration: Bayonetta's stylish witch from Bayonetta games

concept_hook: Toronto's gene-spliced hybrid surges with feral strength bursts to rend flesh, her clinical self-control eroding into pained roars when systems overload.
body_type: perfectly sculpted athletic with enhanced glowing veins and mixed heritage allure
media_archetype_inspiration: Nemesis hybrid experiment from Resident Evil
